The shirky wording of the statement he issued today does not exactly enhance his reputation for straightforwardness. Unfortunately, continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110% needed in this role, Andy Coulson said. Max Clifford , the well-known public relations guru who reportedly received a lucrative settlement when his phones were tapped, said that Edmonson's firing and Andy Coulson 's resignation was like a volcano that is starting to erupt. `` There will be huge explosions all over Fleet Street if police get to the truth,'' he told the BBC.
